pages.name: Brackets
pages.description: A react application where you can create your own brackets for tracking competitions, like sports, beer pong, etc.

pages.name: Isometric Rooms
pages.description: Scroll through my 3D gym models in an orthographic perspective.

pages.name: Space Tour
pages.description: When you start with Threejs it seems common to make an app related to space or planets, so here is mine...

pages.name: Gears 'n' Pipes
pages.description: Steampunk inspired site with two different scenes. Used to be my github homepage, now it is looking for a new purpose.

pages.name: Hello Lamp
pages.description: My first Threejs application with two of my earliest 3D models. Now used mostly for learning and testing. It forces full screen, so just press esc or scroll form top.
